channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Which states could have abortion on the ballot in 2024?
item.description: Organizers of an effort to scale back Arkansas' abortion ban face a deadline to submit enough signatures to try to get their proposal before voters in November

item.title: ‘Once-in-a-lifetime’ cosmic event to appear in night sky after star explodes
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: Britain's Labour Party projected to win huge majority as Sunak concedes
item.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said early Friday that the British people have "delivered a sobering verdict," and the Labour Party has won the U.K. election.

item.title: 2 dead, 7 injured after suspected drunk driver plows into New York City park
item.description: Two people are dead, and seven others have been injured after a suspected drunk driver plowed his vehicle into a park in NYC on the Fourth of July.

item.title: The UK election winner only becomes prime minister when King Charles III says so
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: 7/4: CBS Evening News
item.description: California firefighters battling Thompson Fire contend with simmering heat; Nonprofit reunites Marines with their K9s

item.title: Hurricane Beryl strengthens to Category 3 as it heads toward Yucatan Peninsula
item.description: Hurricane Beryl has strengthened to a Category 3.

item.title: Trump Throws 4th Of July Fit In 'Disgraceful' New Holiday Tantrum
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: At least 2 dead, 7 hurt after driver strikes pedestrians in NYC park
item.description: At least two people were killed and seven others injured when a driver crashed into a Manhattan park Thursday night during a July 4th celebration, authorities said.

item.title: Shark believed to have injured 4 people in waters off Gulf Coast on Fourth of July
item.description: The same shark is believed to have injured four people in waters off South Padre Island on July 4.

item.title: The real estate market is in for sharp correction with losses that could take a decade to recover from, strategist says
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: CBS Reports | America Unfiltered: The Voices Behind the Polls
item.description: You've seen the CBS News polls that tell you what voters think about big ideas like democracy and the American Dream. Now CBS Reports takes you behind the polls for unfiltered conversations about how their personal stories shaped their views.

item.title: Parent company of Saks Fifth Avenue to buy rival Neiman Marcus
item.description: The parent company of Saks Fifth Avenue has signed a deal to buy upscale rival Neiman Marcus Group, which owns Neiman Marcus and Bergdorf Goodman stores, for $2.65 billion, with online behemoth Amazon holding a minority stake

item.title: ‘Our loyalty isn’t worth anything’: I paid $70 for a seat with more legroom, but two women grabbed similar empty seats for free. Is that fair?
item.description: Read more on this topic here

item.title: At least 2 swimmers bitten by shark off Texas' South Padre Island
item.description: Another two people encountered the same shark, but were not seriously hurt, officials said.
